entry.name: Consolidated weight
entry.description: The measured consolidated weight.

entry.name: Net weight
entry.description: Weight of goods including any packaging that normally going with the goods.

entry.name: Goods item gross weight
entry.description: Weight (mass) of goods including packing but excluding the carrier's equipment.

entry.name: Total net weight
entry.description: Total weight of goods excluding packaging.

entry.name: Consignment gross weight
entry.description: Total gross weight (mass) of all goods items referred to as one consignment including packaging but excluding any transport equipment.

entry.name: Net net weight
entry.description: Weight (mass) if goods without any packaging.

entry.name: Stern thrust
entry.description: Force exerted by a thruster installed at the stern of a vessel.

entry.name: Bow thrust
entry.description: Force exerted by a thruster installed at the bow of a vessel.

entry.name: Hydrate content of an alcoholic product at bottling
entry.description: The hydrate content of an alcoholic product at the moment of bottling.

entry.name: Number of units per pallet
entry.description: The number of units contained on a pallet.

entry.name: Fat content
entry.description: An indication of the fat content of a product.

entry.name: Transport means gross weight
entry.description: The measure of the overall size of a ship determined in accordance with the provisions of the International Convention on Tonnage Measurement of Ships.

entry.name: Net tonnage of the vessel
entry.description: The measure of the useful capacity of a ship determined in accordance with the provisions of the International Convention on Tonnage Measurement of Ships.

entry.name: Humidity
entry.description: Degree of moisture.

entry.name: Voltage
entry.description: Electromotive force, or difference of electronic potential between two points.

entry.name: Power consumption
entry.description: Value of energy consumption.

entry.name: Heat dissipation
entry.description: Measurement of the rate of dispersal of heat.

entry.name: Air flow
entry.description: Measurement of the flow of air.

entry.name: Shock impact
entry.description: Measurement of the impact of a shock.

entry.name: Operative temperature
entry.description: Temperature identified system or process works according to specifications.

entry.name: Non operative temperature
entry.description: Temperature identified system or process does not work according to specifications.

entry.name: Gross volume
entry.description: The volume unadjusted for factors such as temperature or gravity.

entry.name: Net volume
entry.description: The volume after adjustment for factors such as temperature or gravity.

entry.name: Water content
entry.description: Water content in product.

entry.name: Tensile stress
entry.description: The measured tensile stress.

entry.name: Fibrosity
entry.description: The measured fibrosity.

entry.name: Gauge length
entry.description: The measured gauge length.

entry.name: Radius
entry.description: The measured radius.

entry.name: Straightness
entry.description: Straightness of the item.

entry.name: Strain
entry.description: The measured strain.

entry.name: Item width when unrolled
entry.description: The width of an item when unrolled.

entry.name: Item length when unrolled
entry.description: The length of an item when unrolled.

entry.name: Item area when unrolled
entry.description: The area occupied by an item when unrolled.

entry.name: Original wort
entry.description: Measure of the malt and hops content of beer, before fermentation has taken place.

entry.name: Volume
entry.description: The amount of air space taken up by the entity identified in the 6311 qualifier.

entry.name: Angle
entry.description: The angle of an object.

entry.name: Peg hole horizontal distance from package leftmost edge
entry.description: Horizontal distance from the left most edge of the package to the center of the hole into which the peg is inserted.

entry.name: Peg hole vertical distance from package top
entry.description: Vertical distance from the top of the package to the top of the hole into which the peg is inserted.

entry.name: Number of layers per pallet
entry.description: The number of layers per pallet.

entry.name: Product strengh, chemical
entry.description: The amount of the single active chemical ingredient within a product.

entry.name: Product strength basis, chemical
entry.description: Amount of product used as the basis for the specification of the chemical product strenght.

entry.name: Item weight
entry.description: Weight at line item level.

entry.name: Payload weight, maximum
entry.description: The maximum weight of a payload.

entry.name: Weight of conveyance
entry.description: Tonnage of conveyance.

entry.name: Conveyance summer dead weight
entry.description: Registered summer dead weight total tonnage of the vessel.

entry.name: Containerized cargo on vessel's weight
entry.description: Total weight of containerized cargo on vessel.

entry.name: Non-containerized cargo on vessel's weight
entry.description: Total weight of non-containerized cargo on vessel.

entry.name: Ascertained weight
entry.description: Endorsement of the true weight (mass) as ascertained or verified.

entry.name: Chargeable weight
entry.description: The weight on which charges are based.

entry.name: Estimated gross weight
entry.description: Estimated weight (mass) of goods, including packing and excluding carrier's.

entry.name: Estimated volume
entry.description: Estimated size or measure of anything in three dimensions.

entry.name: Vessel overall length
entry.description: Total overall length of the vessel.

entry.name: Loading meters
entry.description: The length in a vehicle, whereby the complete width and height over that length is needed for the goods.

entry.name: Number of axles
entry.description: Number of axles of movable equipment or means of transport on wheels.

entry.name: Payload
entry.description: The revenue-producing load carried by a means of transport.

entry.name: Start position in the length
entry.description: The starting position from the beginning of an item located in the length direction.

entry.name: End position in the length
entry.description: The end position from the beginning of an item located in the length direction.

entry.name: Start position in the width
entry.description: The start position from the beginning of an item located in the width direction.

entry.name: End position in the width
entry.description: The end position from the beginning of an item located in the width direction.

entry.name: Start position in the thickness
entry.description: The start position from the beginning of an item located in the thickness direction.

entry.name: End position in the thickness
entry.description: The end position from the beginning of an item located in the thickness direction.

entry.name: Transport container actual filling weight
entry.description: Actual filling weight of a transport container.

entry.name: Transport container maximum capacity
entry.description: Maximum capacity of a transport container.

entry.name: Declared net weight
entry.description: The declared net weight of a product or products used for invoicing, customs or transport purposes.

entry.name: Loading height
entry.description: Maximum height of products or packages loaded onto a given transportation device or equipment such as a pallet.

entry.name: Stacking height
entry.description: Maximum height up to which the same product or package may be placed one upon the other for storage purposes.

entry.name: Calculated weight
entry.description: The calculated weight of the item based on the ordered dimensions.

entry.name: Ferrite
entry.description: The chemical composition ferrite.

entry.name: Impurity
entry.description: The impurity of the product i.e. the measurement of other chemical elements not normally appearing in a product.

entry.name: Grain size
entry.description: The grain size.

entry.name: Lanthanides
entry.description: The chemical element Lanthanides.

entry.name: Elasticity
entry.description: The value of the elasticity.

entry.name: Drained weight
entry.description: The weight of a product when all liquids used in the packaging of the product have been removed.

entry.name: Gallium
entry.description: Measurement of the gallium component.

entry.name: Strontium
entry.description: Measurement of the strontium component.

entry.name: Area
entry.description: Extent or measure of a surface.

entry.name: Equipment storage limitation
entry.description: Maximum storage limit of the equipment.

entry.name: Radioactive index of transport
entry.description: The index of transport determines the maximum radiation level at a distance of 1m from the external surface.

entry.name: Radioactivity
entry.description: Activity of radioactive material.

entry.name: Average gross weight
entry.description: Weight which is the outcome of the division of the total gross weight by the number of units.

entry.name: Forward draft
entry.description: Depth of water from the surface of water to the bottom of the vessel measured at the draft mark of the bow.

entry.name: After draft
entry.description: Depth of water from the surface of water to the bottom of the vessel measured at the draft mark of the stern.

entry.name: Acidity
entry.description: The quality, state, or degree of being acid.

entry.name: Transport equipment gross weight
entry.description: Weight of a transport equipment including the cargo and carrier's equipment.

entry.name: Total transport equipment gross weight
entry.description: Total weight of all transport equipment including the cargo and carrier's equipment.

entry.name: Acidity of juice
entry.description: Acid measurement of juice.

entry.name: Penetrometry
entry.description: Measurement of force required to drive a standard penetrating stamp.

entry.name: Durofel
entry.description: Measurement of the elastic force using a standard penetrating stamp.

entry.name: Juice weight per 100 grams
entry.description: Measurement of weight of juice, based on 100 grams of the entire weight.

entry.name: Fruit skin colour
entry.description: Measurement of the colouring of the epidermis of a fruit.

entry.name: Angle of bend
entry.description: The measured angle of bend.

entry.name: Fixed incremental measurement
entry.description: The measurement of the fixed increment.

entry.name: Durofel D10
entry.description: Measure of the elastic force of the pulp of a fruit. It is measured with a penetrating stamp with diameter 10.

entry.name: Durofel D25
entry.description: Measure of the elastic force of the pulp of a fruit. It is measured with a penetrating stamp with diameter 25.

entry.name: Durofel D50
entry.description: Measure of the elastic force of the pulp of a fruit. It is measured with a penetrating stamp with diameter 50.

entry.name: Maximum stacking weight
entry.description: The maximum weight which may be stacked upon a product or package without the product or packaging being crushed.

entry.name: Gross measure cube
entry.description: The total cubic space occupied by an item, taking into account any protruding components, arrived at by multiplying the maximum length, width and height.

entry.name: Percentage fat content in dry matter
entry.description: The percentage of fat content in dry matter.

entry.name: Saccharometric content
entry.description: Measurement of the sugar content of a solution.

entry.name: Hydrate content of an alcoholic product after bottling
entry.description: The hydrate content which occurs in an alcoholic product after bottling.

entry.name: Anhydrous content
entry.description: The non-water content.

entry.name: Certified weight
entry.description: Weight which has been certified.

entry.name: Freeboard
entry.description: The vertical distance between the waterline and the upper edge of the deck line.

entry.name: Maximum vessel draught
entry.description: The depth of water needed to float the ship (Maximum vessel draught according to Load Line Certificate IMO, MSC/Circ. 920 15 June 1999).

entry.name: Net explosive weight
entry.description: Mass of the explosive part or substance of goods without any packing.

entry.name: Radioactive criticality safety index
entry.description: A number, assigned to fissile material i.e. material capable of sustaining a nuclear chain reaction, which is used to provide control over the accumulation of packages containing such material.

entry.name: Waste currently on board
entry.description: Amount of waste on board at the moment of the notification.

entry.name: Waste to be delivered at waste reception facility
entry.description: Amount of waste to be delivered to a waste reception facility, e.g. in the port of call.

entry.name: Waste to be generated until next port of call, estimated
entry.description: Estimated amount of waste to be generated between creation of the current notification and arrival in the next port of call, irrespective of use of incinerator or compactor or disposal at sea.

entry.name: Waste remaining on board at departure
entry.description: Amount of waste remaining on board when leaving the port of call.

entry.name: Colour depth
entry.description: The number of distinct colours represented, e.g. in an image or in a display.

entry.name: Colour depth, maximum
entry.description: The maximum number of distinct colours that can be represented, e.g. in an image or in a display.

entry.name: Image resolution
entry.description: The level of detail of an image.

entry.name: Device resolution, maximum
entry.description: The maximum level of detail produced by a device.

entry.name: Acoustic absorption coefficient
entry.description: The portion of sound energy a surface absorbs, measured at different frequencies.

entry.name: Billed weight
entry.description: The measured billed weight.

entry.name: Breaking load
entry.description: The measured breaking load.

entry.name: Platinum
entry.description: The measurement of the platinum component.

entry.name: Silver
entry.description: The measurement of the silver component.

entry.name: List
entry.description: The leaning or inclination of a vessel expressed in degrees port or starboard.

entry.name: Trim
entry.description: The condition of a vessel with reference to its longitudinal axis.

entry.name: Free water
entry.description: The volume of water present in a container that is not in suspension in the contained liquid.

entry.name: Bands
entry.description: The measured bands.

entry.name: API (American Petroleum Institute) gravity
entry.description: The relative density of petroleum liquids as specified by a standard developed by the API.

entry.name: Petroleum gross observed volume
entry.description: The total volume of all petroleum liquids and sediment and water, excluding free water, at observed temperature and pressure.

entry.name: Petroleum gross standard volume
entry.description: The total volume of all petroleum liquids, sediment, and water excluding free water, corrected by the appropriate volume correction factor for the observed temperature and American Petroleum Institute relative density, or density to a standard temperature.

entry.name: Volume variance
entry.description: The change in the volume measurement.

entry.name: Petroleum net standard volume
entry.description: The total volume of all petroleum liquids, excluding sediment and water and free water, corrected by the appropriate volume correction factor for the observed temperature and American Petroleum Institute gravity relative to density or to a standard temperature.

entry.name: Material on-board quantity, after discharge
entry.description: The material in vessel tanks, void spaces, and pipelines after discharge.

entry.name: Petroleum total calculated volume
entry.description: The total volume of all petroleum liquids, sediment and water corrected by the appropriate volume correction factor for the observed temperature and American Petroleum Institute (API) gravity, relative density, or density to a standard temperature.

entry.name: Petroleum total observed volume
entry.description: The total volume of all petroleum liquids, sediment and water and free water at observed temperature and pressure.

entry.name: Innage gauge distance
entry.description: The measured distance from the surface of the liquid to a fixed datum plate or to the tank bottom.

entry.name: Petroleum net standard weight
entry.description: The total weight of all petroleum liquids excluding sediments, water and free water.

entry.name: Sediment and water in petroleum
entry.description: The measurement of non-hydrocarbon solid material and water in suspension in petroleum liquid.

entry.name: Observed reference height, tank
entry.description: The observed distance from the tank bottom or datum plate to the established reference point.

entry.name: Reference height, tank
entry.description: The measured distance from the tank bottom or datum plate to the established reference point.

entry.name: Ullage gauge distance
entry.description: The measured distance from the cargo liquid surface to the reference point.

entry.name: Trim correction
entry.description: The correction applied to the observed gauge or observed volume when a vessel is not on an even keel.

entry.name: Bow to bridge distance
entry.description: The distance between the bow and the bridge of a vessel.

entry.name: Peg hole number
entry.description: Used to identify the peg hole if more than one hole is present in the product or packaging.

entry.name: Number of inner packs
entry.description: Indicates the number of non coded physical groupings (inner packs) of next lower level trade items within the current trade item level.

entry.name: Number of next level trade items within inner pack
entry.description: The number of next lower level trade items contained within the physical non-coded grouping (inner pack).

entry.name: Number of trade items per pallet layer
entry.description: The number of trade items contained on a single layer of a pallet.

entry.name: Packed items layer height
entry.description: The height of a single layer of packed items.

entry.name: Packing material weight, skin tight covering
entry.description: The weight measurement of the packing material used for skin tight covering (e.g. when packaging prepared meats, poultry, cheese, and other food products).

entry.name: Brightness
entry.description: The measured brightness.

entry.name: Brakes
entry.description: The measured brakes.

entry.name: Components labelled for recycling percentage
entry.description: Percentage of trade item components that clearly label how to facilitate product disassembly and recycling.

entry.name: Renewable plastic components percentage, by net weight
entry.description: The percentage of the plastic components only made from rapidly renewable plant-based material by net weight of product.

entry.name: Clamp pressure, required
entry.description: The pressure that should be applied by a clamp.

entry.name: Break
entry.description: The measured break.

entry.name: Ascertained volume
entry.description: Endorsement of the true volume as ascertained or verified.

entry.name: Unit weight
entry.description: The weight of a unit.

entry.name: Total volume
entry.description: Total volume of goods and/or parcels.

entry.name: Unit volume
entry.description: The volume of a unit.

entry.name: Vertical center of gravity
entry.description: Distance of vertical center of gravity relative to item's base.

entry.name: Maximum allowable transport stacking weight
entry.description: Maximum weight allowed to be stowed on top of an item during transport.

entry.name: Carbon Dioxide
entry.description: Measurement of the carbon dioxide (C02) component.

entry.name: Number of base units per pallet
entry.description: The number of base units contained on a pallet.

entry.name: Colony forming unit
entry.description: Micro-organism colonies that are to be counted under determined conditions.

entry.name: Diluted liquid volume
entry.description: The volume of liquid which results after a dilution agent has been added, e.g. undiluted orange juice of 200ml, after dilution with water the volume of diluted liquid equals 1 litre.

entry.name: Energy efficiency
entry.description: A measurement of the energy efficiency of an article.

entry.name: Number of layers
entry.description: Number of layers of a product or products within a package, container, etc.

entry.name: Maximum demand
entry.description: The highest demand recorded during the period of recording of usage of the supply.

entry.name: Number of pallet places
entry.description: The number of pallet places needed to store or to transport pallets (can be stacked).

entry.name: Package net measurement, cubed
entry.description: An indication of the net cubed measurement of a package.

entry.name: Power factor
entry.description: The ratio of the power dissipated (active power in kW) to the total power (which is the product of the input volts times amps given in kVa). When equipment which uses reactive power is being operated the power factor will be less than one.

entry.name: Stacking factor excluding bottom item
entry.description: Maximum number of identical items stackable on top of item.

entry.name: Breaking strength
entry.description: The measured breaking strength.

entry.name: Breaking strength wet
entry.description: The measured breaking strength when wet.

entry.name: Step size
entry.description: An indication of measurements in which options contained within a Customer Specific Article are available, e.g. 10 metre planks of wood may be sold in step sizes of 2 metres.

entry.name: Number of units per package
entry.description: The number of identified units per package.

entry.name: Number of units per layer
entry.description: Number of units of a product or package within one layer of a package, container, etc.

entry.name: Weight per running metre
entry.description: A code used to indicate the weight per running metre of floor coverings over floor area.

entry.name: Weight per square metre
entry.description: A code used to indicate the weight per square metre of floor coverings over floor area.

entry.name: Acidity of meat
entry.description: The meat's acid quality or condition.

entry.name: Slaughtering weight
entry.description: Weight immediately after slaughter.

entry.name: Stacking factor including bottom item
entry.description: Maximum number of items stackable upon each other, including the bottom item.

entry.name: Number of units in the width of a layer
entry.description: Number of units of a product or package which make up the width of a layer in a package, container, pallet, etc.

entry.name: Number of units in the depth of a layer
entry.description: Number of units of a product or package which make up the depth of a layer in a package, container, pallet, etc.

entry.name: Nestable percentage
entry.description: Extent expressed as a percentage to which an item can be nested within an identical item, e.g. paper cups.

entry.name: Gross weight including carrier's equipment
entry.description: Weight (mass) of goods including packaging and the carrier's equipment. In this context 'carrier's equipment' means any material resources necessary to facilitate the transport and handling of the goods without having the ability to move by its own propulsion, e.g. pallet, container, etc.

entry.name: Sugar content
entry.description: The rate of sugar.

entry.name: Self-accelerating polymerization temperature (SAPT)
entry.description: The lowest temperature at which polymerization may occur for a substance as packed for transport.

entry.name: Self-accelerating decomposition temperature (SADT)
entry.description: The lowest temperature at which self-accelerating decomposition may occur for a substance as packed for transport.

entry.name: Control temperature
entry.description: The controlled transport temperature to avoid decomposition of self-reactive substances and organic peroxides.

entry.name: Basis weight
entry.description: The measured basis weight.

entry.name: Change
entry.description: The measured change.

entry.name: Emergency temperature
entry.description: The temperature at which emergency response is required for self-reactive substances and organic peroxides.

entry.name: Colour
entry.description: The measured colour.

entry.name: Contents of package
entry.description: In combination with the other data elements of the actual segment this code indicates the measured content of a package.

entry.name: Commercial weight
entry.description: Item weight considering its maximum possible humidity.

entry.name: Core length
entry.description: To specify length of core on which product is to be placed.

entry.name: Destination weight agreement
entry.description: The agreed weight of despatched goods whose weight may change during transport.

entry.name: Diameter
entry.description: Diameter of an article.

entry.name: Delta value L
entry.description: The measured delta value L.

entry.name: Density
entry.description: The measured density.

entry.name: Depth
entry.description: The measured depth.

entry.name: Denier
entry.description: The measured fineness of a material.

entry.name: Distance between points
entry.description: The measured distance between points.

entry.name: Width, boxcar door
entry.description: The measured width of a boxcar door.

entry.name: Estimated new weight
entry.description: The measured estimated new weight.

entry.name: Elongation
entry.description: The measured elongation.

entry.name: Deficit weight
entry.description: The measured deficit weight.

entry.name: Filament count
entry.description: Used e.g. in textile, print industries.

entry.name: Longitudinal flatness
entry.description: The measured longitudinal flatness.

entry.name: Flatness
entry.description: The measured flatness.

entry.name: Transverse flatness
entry.description: The measured transverse flatness.

entry.name: Gauge
entry.description: The measured gauge.

entry.name: Gross weight, maximum
entry.description: The measured maximum gross weight.

entry.name: Hardness
entry.description: The measured hardness.

entry.name: Height, maximum
entry.description: The measured maximum height.

entry.name: Height dimension
entry.description: Numeric value of height.

entry.name: Impact energy
entry.description: The measured impact energy.

entry.name: Inside diameter
entry.description: The measured inside diameter.

entry.name: Legal weight
entry.description: The measured legal weight.

entry.name: Length, maximum
entry.description: The measured maximum length.

entry.name: Length
entry.description: To specify the value of a length dimension.

entry.name: Lost end
entry.description: The measured lost end.

entry.name: Minimum weight
entry.description: The measured minimum weight.

entry.name: Moisture
entry.description: Measurement application is the moisture content of the item.

entry.name: Maximum weight
entry.description: The measured maximum weight.

entry.name: Actual net weight
entry.description: The actual weight of the goods excluding packaging.

entry.name: Outside diameter
entry.description: The measured outside diameter.

entry.name: Pre stretch
entry.description: Measurement identifying the amount an item has been stretched prior to use.

entry.name: Per tonne
entry.description: A measurement per tonne.

entry.name: Relative humidity
entry.description: The measured relative humidity.

entry.name: Resistivity
entry.description: The measured resistivity.

entry.name: Rockwell C
entry.description: Hardness in the Rockwell C scale.

entry.name: Ream weight
entry.description: Measurement indication for paper.

entry.name: Reduction of area
entry.description: The measured reduction of area.

entry.name: Run (process)
entry.description: The measured run (process).

entry.name: Ratio
entry.description: The measured ratio.

entry.name: Shipped quantity
entry.description: The measured shipped quantity.

entry.name: Tare weight
entry.description: Weight excluding goods and loose accessories.

entry.name: Temperature
entry.description: A measurement in relation to temperature.

entry.name: Thickness
entry.description: The measured thickness.

entry.name: Time period
entry.description: Measurement of a specific length of time.

entry.name: Time
entry.description: The measured time.

entry.name: Transport equipment verified gross mass (weight)
entry.description: The gross mass (weight) of the transport equipment verified according to SOLAS Chapter VI, Regulation 2, paragraphs 4-6.

entry.name: Height, van door
entry.description: The height of the door of a van or container.

entry.name: Width, van door
entry.description: The width of the door of a van or container.

entry.name: Weight per unit of area
entry.description: The weight per unit of an area.

entry.name: Width dimension
entry.description: Numeric value of width.

entry.name: Width, maximum
entry.description: The maximum distance from side to side.

entry.name: Weight per unit of length
entry.description: The weight per unit of length.

entry.name: Side height, flat bed with removable sides
entry.description: The height of the removable sides of a flat bed truck.

entry.name: Squareness
entry.description: The measured squareness.

entry.name: Spool size
entry.description: The measured spool size.

entry.name: Yield stress
entry.description: The measured yield stress.

entry.name: Aluminium
entry.description: The measured chemical element aluminium.

entry.name: Arsenic
entry.description: The measured chemical element arsenic.

entry.name: Boron
entry.description: The measured chemical element boron.

entry.name: Bismuth
entry.description: The measured chemical element bismuth.

entry.name: Carbon
entry.description: The measured chemical element carbon.

entry.name: Calcium
entry.description: The measured chemical element calcium.

entry.name: Columbium
entry.description: The measured chemical element columbium.

entry.name: Cerium
entry.description: The measured chemical element cerium.

entry.name: Chlorine
entry.description: The measured chemical element chlorine.

entry.name: Cobalt
entry.description: The measured chemical element cobalt.

entry.name: Chromium
entry.description: The measured chemical element chromium.

entry.name: Copper
entry.description: The measured chemical element copper.

entry.name: Iron
entry.description: The measured chemical element iron.

entry.name: Iron plus silicon
entry.description: The measured substance iron plus silicon.

entry.name: Germanium
entry.description: The measured chemical element germanium.

entry.name: Hydrogen
entry.description: The measured chemical element hydrogen.

entry.name: Potassium
entry.description: The measured chemical element potassium.

entry.name: Magnesium
entry.description: The measured chemical element magnesium.

entry.name: Manganese
entry.description: The measured chemical element manganese.

entry.name: Molybdenum
entry.description: The measured chemical element molybdenum.

entry.name: Nitrogen
entry.description: The measured chemical element nitrogen.

entry.name: Sodium
entry.description: The measured chemical element sodium.

entry.name: Niobium
entry.description: The chemical element niobium.

entry.name: Nickel
entry.description: The measured chemical element nickel.

entry.name: Oxygen
entry.description: The measured chemical element oxygen.

entry.name: Phosphorus
entry.description: The measured chemical element phosphorus.

entry.name: Lead
entry.description: The measured chemical element lead.

entry.name: Sulphur
entry.description: The measured chemical element sulphur.

entry.name: Antimony
entry.description: The measured chemical element antimony.

entry.name: Selenium
entry.description: The measured chemical element selenium.

entry.name: Silicon
entry.description: The measured chemical element silicon.

entry.name: Silicium oxyd
entry.description: The measured substance silicium oxyd.

entry.name: Tin
entry.description: The measured chemical element tin.

entry.name: Tantalium
entry.description: The measured chemical element tantalium.

entry.name: Tellurium
entry.description: The measured chemical element tellurium.

entry.name: Titanium
entry.description: The measured chemical element titanium.

entry.name: Vanadium
entry.description: The measured chemical element vanadium.

entry.name: Tungsten
entry.description: The measured chemical element tungsten.

entry.name: Waste content
entry.description: The measured waste content.

entry.name: Zinc
entry.description: The measured chemical element zinc.

entry.name: Zirconium
entry.description: The measured chemical element zirconium.

entry.name: Mutually defined
entry.description: A code assigned within a code list to be used on an interim basis and as defined among trading partners until a precise code can be assigned to the code list.

entry.name: Commission indicator
entry.description: true / false

entry.name: Deposit system
entry.description:
Permitted values:
DISPOSABLE RETURNABLE

entry.name: Deposit type
entry.description:
Permitted values:
PRODUCT_PACKAGING TRANSPORT_EQUIPMENT

entry.name: Fee indicator
entry.description: true = item is a fee

entry.name: Type of article
entry.description: Allowed values: GOODS OTHER_SERVICES

entry.name: Metering point designation, e.g. for electricity or gas
Meter number, e.g. for electricity or gas
Type of packaging (code)
entry.description: Type of packaging in coded form. The packaging units from Rec 20 / Rec 21 are used as the code list. Example XBO=bottle

entry.name: Size code
entry.description: Size information in coded form

entry.name: Size designation
entry.description: Size specifications in text form

entry.name: Type of trading unit
entry.description: Permitted values: MIXED_ASSORTMENT = Assortment UNMIXED_UNIT = Container

entry.name: Waste code (EWC)
entry.description: Waste code according to the European Waste Catalogue (EWC)

entry.name: WEEE registration number
entry.description: WEEE registration number of the manufacturer of the product
